introduction.default: Experienced cybersecurity researcher and machine learning engineer specializing in threat intelligence, AI-driven security solutions, and scalable ML pipelines.

variations.security: Cybersecurity researcher and threat intelligence specialist with expertise in AI-driven security solutions, threat detection methodologies, and large-scale security analytics.
variations.software: Senior software engineer and ML architect with expertise in full-stack development, cloud infrastructure, and scalable AI/ML pipeline design.
variations.research: Academic researcher focused on cybersecurity education, semantic technologies, and AI applications in threat detection with peer-reviewed publications.
variations.leadership: Technical leader with experience in cross-functional team management, mentoring, and driving organizational efficiency through automation and process optimization.
